<style>
.step {
margin: auto;
padding: 50vh 0;
border: 2px solid red;

</style>
<script type="module">
const scroller = scrollama();
console.log(scroller)
scroller.setup({
  step: ".step", debug: true
}).onStepEnter((response) => {
  console.log("Inside step enter")
  console.log(response)
}).onStepExit((response) => {
  console.log("Inside step exit")
  console.log(response)
})
</script>
<div>

<div class="step">I am a patchwork of experience gained from many side quests, but these days I'm playing with Svelte these days.</div>
<div class="step">Right now I'm a PhD Candidate at Monash University, Australia, an previously an R Shiny Developer at Appsilon.</div>
<div class="step">My roots are in a small humble island of Sri Lanka with its sunny beaches and cold mountains.</div>
<div class="step">There's more to who I am, what I have done and how I ended up here. An updated history of my work and achievements can be foud in my <a href="Janith_Wanniarachchi_Portfolio.pdf">my CV here</a> </div>
</div>
